=== GNOME Snaps Status ===

The following snaps have been seeded in Ubuntu:
* gnome-calculator
* gnome-characters
* gnome-logs
* gnome-system-monitor
* gtk-common-themes
* gnome-3-34-1804
* gnome-3-28-1804
* snap-store # stable/ubuntu-20.04 and stable/ubuntu-20.10

Each of the seeded snaps have to have a track for each stable release of Ubuntu, stable/ubuntu-VERSION.  For example "stable/ubuntu-18.04".  These tracks should be opened and closed again, which makes the snaps track latest stable.  The track can be reopened in the future.

Auto Stable means that we automatically publish to the candidate branch upon new pushes to the upstream stable branch. Auto Master means that we automatically publish to the edge branch upon new pushes to the upstream master branch. Currently, these features are blocked on the Snap YAML file being accepted upstream.

To get the auto master build page, just add the -master suffix, like https://code.launchpad.net/~ubuntu-desktop/+snap/gnome-calculator-master
